TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1060
TEI.2.document_title: William Brenaugh to Stephen F. Austin, 03-19-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: William Brenaugh to Austin, March 19, 1825. Wants land. Has 12 negroes.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1060

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*William Brenaugh to Austin, March 19, 1825. Wants land. Has 12 negroes.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* *p**location_mentioned*Natchitoches*/location_mentioned**/p* *p**date_mentioned n="03-19-1825">March 19—1825.*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Sir*/p*
*p*It is my wish to procure *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*in your *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*: I am a man of *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned*, have twelve *person_mentioned*negroes*/person_mentioned* and will improve the same within the time prescribed by law— I authorize *person_mentioned*Mr Smith*/person_mentioned* to locate it for me.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*WM Brenaugh*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Mr. S. F. Austin */person_mentioned**/p* *p**location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
